players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Who found Diana and did anyone notice anything unusual last night?"
You: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night."
Bob: "I found Diana this morning too; I didn't see anyone else near her. Strange that Alice would immediately accuse me—Alice, what did your investigation say exactly?"
Charlie: "Bob, can you explain exactly what you saw and why Alice's claim would be false? Alice, what role did your investigation return for Bob?"

You: "I investigated Bob last night and my investigation returned 'mafioso.' I understand it's quick, but I had to speak up — we can't afford to hesitate when a townie is dead. Bob, can you explain any evidence you have that contradicts an official investigation result?"

Bob: "That's a bold claim, Alice — are you sure you didn't get a false positive? Investigations can be wrong or framed. Alice, when exactly did you investigate me and whom did you talk to before claiming this?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
